document.full_text: in an unusual, and apparently heated, closed-door session, pakistan's spy chief denied that pakistan maintained any links with militant groups, according to lawmakers.
document.title: denying links to militants, pakistan's spy chief denounces u.s. before parliament
lines_and_colors: in an unusual, and apparently heated, closed-door session, pakistan's spy chief denied that pakistan maintained any links with militant groups, according to lawmakers.
